comments:
Upon opening the Profiling perspective, I got the following exception:

java.io.IOException:
/home/craigcw/eclipse/3.0.1-gtk/plugins/org.eclipse.cdt.oprofile.core.linux_1.1.0/os/linux/x86/opxml:
cannot execute
        at java.lang.UNIXProcess.forkAndExec(Native Method)
        at java.lang.UNIXProcess.<init>(UNIXProcess.jaa:156)
        at java.lang.ProcHelper.run(ProcHelper.java:59)

The perspective failed to open.

Chaning the file permissions of
plugins/org.eclipse.cdt.oprofile.core.linux_1.1.0/os/linux/x86/opxml to allow
execution fixed it.

I found that workspace/org.eclipse.cdt.oprofile.core.linux/opcontrol need to
have its permissions updated as well.

There are new installation scripts that must be run manually after installing
Eclipse-OProfile.  These installation scripts set the executable bits on opxml
and opcontrol (among other things).

See
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/org.eclipse.cdt-contrib/org.eclipse.cdt.oprofile-home/downloads.html?cvsroot=Tools_Project
for instructions.
